body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to NoteWorthy Music School. My name is George Howard. How can I assist you today?

Hi George! I'm Gloria Scott. I'm calling to inquire about my recent bill.

It's nice to meet you, Gloria. I can definitely help with that. Could you please provide me with your billing account number?

Sure! My account number is one two three four five six.

Thank you, Gloria. Just a moment while I pull up your account details.

I have your information here now. Could you confirm your last payment amount?

I believe it was two zero zero dollars.

Great, thank you for confirming that. I see the payment here. Is there anything specific about the bill you'd like to ask?

I just wanted to ensure everything was correct. Looks like it is.

Perfect! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time, Gloria, and have a wonderful day.

Thank you, George! You too!
